item.title: Flight Deck Window Heat Systems – No. 3 Windows

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated window heat is deactivated.

numlitem.para: Observe associated EICAS advisory message "L (R) SIDE WINDOW" displayed.

placard.para: Placard Window Heat System panel "(location) WINDOW HEAT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Turn affected side Window Heat Switch ON.
Touch affected side windows to confirm if side Window Heat #2 and/or #3 are inoperative.
If #3 side Window Heat is inoperative, pull and collar affected side window power circuit breaker:
